staking.title: Staking
staking.stakingInfo: If you already have a stake account, you can convert it to elSOL with no fees.
staking.unstakingCaution: â€» When you unstake, the SOL accumulated after rewards are added will be distributed to your wallet's stake account. By deactivating the stake account, the SOL will be unlocked in the next epoch. (Up to approximately 2 days)
staking.instantUnstaking: Use Swap to unstake your SOL instantly.

StakingHeroRow.subtitle1: Stake your SOL in the elSOL pool (created with Solana Foundation official Stake Pool Program) to earn staking rewards and additional incentives.
StakingHeroRow.subtitle2: As an elSOL holder, you contribute to the decentralization and security enhancement of the Solana blockchain.
